author: Moobeat (noreply@blogger.com)
title: 1/19 PBE Update
text:
[This is a  W ORK  I N  P ROGRESS POST .] [ Status : The PBE is back up and online.]

The PBE has been updated! Small update today as the 7.2 cycle winds down!

Continue reading for more information!

( Warning : PBE Content is tentative and subject to change - what you see below may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers at the end of the cycle! Manage your expectations accordingly.)

Table of Contents Chroma Tweaks Miscellaneous Balance Changes 
Chroma Tweaks Popstar Ahri Citrine chroma tweaked, ears are now purple to match hair, as well as Prestigious LeBlanc Tanzanite, her gloves and hat band are now purple. 
Popstar Ahri - Citrine [ Comparison ] 
Prestigious LeBlanc - Tanzanite [ Comparison ] 
Miscellaneous The dummy in the practice tool now has animations for spawning, hits, and on death. 

Balance Changes *  Remember  *: The PBE is a testing grounds for new, tentative, and sometimes radical or experimental changes. Be aware that what you see below may be lacking context or other changes that didn't make it in or were implemented in an earlier patch this cycle! These are  not  official notes.

[Not seeing too much. Looking!]

Check out  [ THIS PAGE ]  for a  comprehensive list of the new content & changes currently on the PBE as a part of this cycle  or catch up with the individual update links below !
1/10 PBE Update: Warwick champion update, Sewn Chaos Amumu & Blitzcrank, new chroma, Practice tool assets, & more!  1/11 PBE Update: Warwick quote & short bio, Sewn Chaos Amumu + Blitzcrank tweaks, balance changes, and more!  1/12 PBE Update: Revealed Indicator & Balance Changes 1/13 PBE Update: Practice Tool enabled, Warwick login, Sewn Chaos splash art, and more! 1/17 PBE Update: Continued Warwick update tweaks, tentative balance changes, and more!  1/18 PBE Update: Warwick skin tweaks, New summoner icons, tentative balance changes, & more! [ BACK TO TOP ]
